title: fatal error: runtime: C malloc failed
body:
### environment: Amazon EC2 instance AMI: ubuntu14.04 / Docker ubuntu:latest

After fresh PPA ethereum install from ubuntu 14.04, after I type ethereum -mine, I gott this:

Note: I already created a key and used --unlock flag with corresponding address:passphrase.
# 

root@ec2$:ethereum -mine

Welcome to the FRONTIER
2015/03/21 10:12:29 [SERV] Protocol Version: 58, Network Id: 0
2015/03/21 10:12:29 [CHAIN] Last block (#0) fd4af92a79c7fc2fd8bf0d342f2e832e1d4f485c85b9152d2039e03bc604fdca TD=0
2015/03/21 10:12:29 [POW] Making Cache
2015/03/21 10:12:30 [POW] Took: 1.263843747s
2015/03/21 10:12:30 [CLI] Starting  Ethereum(G)/v0.9.1/linux/go1.2.1
2015/03/21 10:12:30 [P2P Server] Starting Server
2015/03/21 10:12:31 [P2P Discovery] Listening,  enode://7c80422b2ca19d95a31ec88f387d32400052597bb795d7f412676b6af3fa44e6468d9ebeb61f805d6e671850585e07134f14dca075f0e2da4ff2ba7c504e4d99@[::]:30303
2015/03/21 10:12:31 [Blockpool] Started
